meta.title: María-Fernanda Villalobos | Frontend Developer
meta.description: Portfolio of María-Fernanda Villalobos, a Frontend Developer recognized as #3 in React in Chile. Specialist in creating inclusive, accessible, and high-performance web experiences.
meta.og_description: Specialist in creating inclusive, accessible, and high-performance web experiences.

hero.name: María-Fernanda Villalobos
hero.headline: Frontend Developer | #3 React.js Developer in Chile (GitHunter)
hero.mission: Passionate about Inclusive Design and crafting accessible web experiences. I transform complex problems into fluid, efficient, and intuitive software solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph_1: Recognized as the #3 React Developer in Chile by GitHunter, my mission is to build technology that feels human. My journey began in health sciences, where I learned that the most important skill is to listen with empathy. Today, I apply that same principle to a different kind of code.
about.paragraph_2: I believe that a great user experience is born from a deep respect for the user's time and attention. This translates into fluid interfaces, fast load times, and a meticulous focus on the 'details that matter.' My passion is crafting accessible (A11y) and inclusive solutions, ensuring that the digital world is open to everyone.

project_1.name: PyDay Chile Conference Website
project_1.challenge: The challenge was to develop the first complete Single-Page Application (SPA) for the Python Chile community under a tight deadline and with the constraint of a pre-existing brand identity.
project_1.contribution: I architected and developed the entire application using Next.js, creating an intuitive navigation structure and an adaptive design that successfully integrated the brand's logo, resulting in a fluid and professional user experience.
project_1.result: The project was delivered on time and served as the main information hub for the event attendees.

project_2.name: Hites - Mobile E-commerce Challenge
project_2.challenge: To replicate a product page's desktop design into a fully responsive, mobile-first version in less than 24 hours as part of a technical challenge for a selection process.
project_2.contribution: I built the interface from scratch using React and CSS, focusing on a flexible layout with Flexbox and Grid. I took the initiative to extract and optimize visual assets from the production site to ensure high fidelity with the brand.
project_2.result: A functional and visually faithful landing page that demonstrated my ability to work efficiently under pressure. The project was very well received by the hiring team, positioning me as one of the two finalists for the role.

project_3.name: Vedic Astrology Calculator
project_3.challenge: To design and develop an interactive web application that calculates and displays Vedic astrology charts based on user data, including their geographical location.
project_3.contribution: I built the application using vanilla JavaScript, integrating the Google Maps API for location selection and creating a dynamic visualization system to present the results in an aesthetically engaging and easy-to-understand way.
project_3.result: A unique and functional application that showcases the ability to handle user input, work with external APIs, and present complex data visually.

contact.title: Contact
contact.invitation: I am available for new challenges. If you have a project in mind or an opportunity that aligns with my profile, feel free to reach out.

footer.text: Designed and built with care by María-Fernanda Villalobos.
